name: Bird Fight Club: Antarctica
description:
Mataphors? I hate metaphors!
That's why my favorite game is Bird Fight Club.
No froo-froo symbolism. Just a good, simple tale about roosters fighting each other.

Ron Birdperson

Content Warnings

Strong language and crude jokes

Features
  • Round-based combat
  • Fight four different opponents
  • around 2k words of narrative
  • experience the 90s again but with talking birds
  • become the new rooster champion and participate in the flightless birds tournament in Antarctica

Made for Bird Jam 2022

Currently, only a early demo is available. More content will be added soon, so feel free to check it out later.
